text: Adrián Lozano Magallanes (born 8 May 1999) is a Mexican footballer who plays as a midfielder for Santos Laguna. ==References== ==External links== *Adrián Lozano at Global Sport Archive *Adrián Lozano at Flashscore *Adrián Lozano at Soccerway Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:1999 births Category:Liga MX players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Santos Laguna footballers Category:Sportspeople from Torreón Category:Footballers from Coahuila
title: Adrián Lozano
